name: Periodic Table Widget
author: Md. Mahafuzur Rahaman

sections.description:
Periodic Table Widget is a slider which show one element from periodic table with some information. It shows, element name, symbol, atomic number, and much more. It have 3 built-in theme and with more slider options.

Features:

  • Full Responsive.
  • Light, Dark and Dynamic Theme.
  • Show name, symbole, mass, electrons, protons, neutrons, electronic configuration, and much more.
  • Three diffrent slide animation.
  • Animation speed.
  • Slide Delay.
  • Loop, Controls and more.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire periodic-table-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress admin.
  3. Now go to your Appearance>Widget menu page.
  4. Find Periodic Table and place it in your sidebar
  5. Choose your theme and slider options and save it.
  6. Enjoy.
sections.faq:
Who should use periodic table widget?

Periodic Table Widget is perfect for education, or chemical business related website.

Do I need to have coding skills to use periodic table widget?

Absolutely not. It\’s super easy.

Is Periodic Table Widget responsive?

Yes, Periodic Table Widget is 100% responsive and mobile friendly.

Can I add Periodic Table Widget anywhere on my website?

No, You can only use it in your sidebar,

Is Periodic Table Widget translation ready?

Yes, Periodic Table Widget is 100% translation ready.

short_description: This is a periodic table widget, which show one element at a time with some information about the element.
